name: Hardline Chrome
description:
Stegman's Hardline 7800 is the latest in a proud line of safety wear. The Hardline is constructed from the same high-density plastics used in some body armor.
Women's sizes currently out of stock.
description_cn:
施特格曼的"强硬路线 7800"是其引以为傲的安全服系列中的最新款."强硬路线"使用了与某些防弹衣相同的高密度塑料制成的.
女款目前缺货.

shop_buy.layout_name_cn: 斯坦顿(Stanton)-亚伦环-德拉玛(Delamar)-列夫斯基(Levski)-Market_ClothingStand
